00278 
00279 inline bool
00280 OverviewMap::containsMap(uint32 mapID) 
00281 {
00282    uint32 tmpVal = m_containingMaps.binarySearch(mapID);
00283    return tmpVal < MAX_UINT32;
00284 }
00285 
00286 inline uint32 
00287 OverviewMap::getNbrOverviewItems() const
00288 {
00289    return m_idTranslationTable.getNbrElements();
00290 }
00291 
00292 inline Item*
00293 OverviewMap::getOverviewItem(uint32 i, uint32 &overviewID,
00294                              uint32 &origMapID, uint32 &origItemID) const
00295 {
00296 
00297    if (m_idTranslationTable.getElement(i, overviewID, origMapID, origItemID)) {
00298       return itemLookup(overviewID);
00299    }
00300    return NULL;
00301 }
00302 
00303 inline bool
00304 OverviewMap::isLowerLevel(uint32 itemID)
00305 {
00306    // From RouteConstants.
00307 #define GET_ZOOM_LEVEL(a) (((a) & 0x7fffffff) >> 27)
00308 #define IS_LOWER_LEVEL(a) ( GET_ZOOM_LEVEL(a) > \
00309                          (uint32)OverviewMap::maxZoomLevelStreetSegmentItems )
00310    return IS_LOWER_LEVEL(itemID);
00311 #undef IS_LOWER_LEVEL
00312 #undef GET_ZOOM_LEVEL
00313 }
00314 
00315 inline bool
00316 OverviewMap::existsOnLevel(int level, uint32 nodeID)
00317 {
00318    // From RouteConstants.
00319 #define GET_ZOOM_LEVEL(a) (((a) & 0x7fffffff) >> 27)
00320    const uint32 zoom = maxZoomLevelForMapLevel[level];
00321    return GET_ZOOM_LEVEL(nodeID) <= zoom;
00322 #undef IS_LOWER_LEVEL
00323 #undef GET_ZOOM_LEVEL  
00324 }
